description: Try our easy to follow Artichoke, Mozzarella & Rocket Pizzas recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Vegetable pizza,High protein,Seafood free,Soy free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Budget,Peanut free
name: Artichoke, Mozzarella & Rocket Pizzas Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 840g whole artichoke hearts in brine (3 jars)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 240Â°C. Line 2 large baking trays with baking paper. Combine yeast, sugar, salt, 1 tbs oil and 3/4 cup warm water in a jug. Whisk well. Stand in a warm place for 10 minutes or until frothy.

Place flour in a large bowl. Stir in yeast mixture until a soft dough forms. Turn out onto a floured surface and knead for 5 minutes or until smooth. Transfer to an oiled bowl, cover with a tea towel and stand in a warm place for 30 minutes or until doubled in size.

Drain 1 jar artichokes and process in a food processor until finely chopped. Add parmesan, 1/3 cup parsley and remaining oil. Process to a thick sauce. Drain remaining artichokes and halve lengthways.

Roll out each portion of dough onto a floured surface to a 28cm oval. Transfer to trays. Spread with artichoke sauce. Top with mozzarella and remaining artichokes. Bake for 1520 minutes or until golden and crisp. Top with rocket and remaining parsley and serve immediately.
